name: George
text: Fun fact, corpses can't really talk...

name: Ben
text: The way I see, I think Katy is innocent, so is Kabejja and Vic. But I wouldn't trust that Mossy character. He is trouble.

name: Vic
text: Emma, she is innocent, I bet you.
And Mossy... He is a dick, He is completely guilty

name: Kiran
text: Well, if it was up to me everyone would be put on trial. Vic, Emma, Pie and all. But not Katy, she is nice.

name: Kabejja
text: Mossy, he is bad news, but Katy she is alright.

name: Mossy
text: Thanks for playing the game, unfortunately, I don't really have anything to say, I mean I think katy wouldn't hurt a fly but that is about it.
And I am not going to lie, Emma is quite cute, so I bet she is innocent.

name: Emma
text: If you ask me, George and Kiran are totally not innocent. You can see it in their faces, but Mossy, he's cool.

name: Pie
text: See, I wouldn't trust Emma, but that is between me and you alright?
And Mossy is great, so come on! why would it be him?
